alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 1:53AM CDT until April 01 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL LAUDERDALE COUNTY... At 153 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near St. Florian, or 8 miles northeast of Florence, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Florence, Killen, St. Florian, Underwood-Petersville, Green Hill, Center Star, Zip City, Elgin and Oakland. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
